name: Notion Meal Planner
description: Notion Meal Planner This Meal Planner template for Notion is your solution for simplifying your meal planning process, as well as managing your recipes and grocery list.Key Features: RECIPE MANAGEMENT Create unlimited meals/recipes within pre-made categories (or add your own categories) MEAL PLANNER Plan your weekly meals quickly and efficiently (drag-and-drop into the meal planner). Add more days, if you wish. MACRO TABLE Track daily nutritional values INGREDIENTS PREVIEW View all ingredients r
features: RECIPE MANAGEMENTCreate unlimited meals/recipes within pre-made categories (or add your own categories); MEAL PLANNERPlan your weekly meals quickly and efficiently (drag-and-drop into the meal planner). Add more days, if you wish.; MACRO TABLETrack daily nutritional values; INGREDIENTS PREVIEWView all ingredients required for your meal plan and add to shopping list.; GROCERIES MASTER LISTCreate a groceries master list with all items you regularly purchase; SHOPPING LISTGenerate your shopping list by adding items from the groceries list.
